analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/36/0xb29aa0a90aad10d8807f76ae83d754a133a20ee0.sol:
	Contract LeahToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0xb29aa0a90aad10d8807f76ae83d754a133a20ee0.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/36/0xb29aa0a90aad10d8807f76ae83d754a133a20ee0.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
